description: This Python source file defines configuration settings for a FastAPI application, primarily handling environment variable parsing and encapsulating these settings in an immutable dataclass.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A dataclass encapsulating environment-driven configuration for the FastAPI app, including host, port, log level, environment, CORS origins, and preview mode settings.

methods.name: "Settings" load()
methods.description: A static method to load configuration settings from environment variables, providing default values and validation.

methods.name: bool _parse_bool(value: Optional[str])
methods.description: A helper function that safely parses string values into boolean.

methods.name: Union[str,List[str]] _parse_cors_origins(raw: Optional[str])
methods.description: A helper function that parses CORS origin strings into appropriate formats for configuration.
